text: Kilekoile bhai khan, amikhan uporte Asia1.8 Asia to Rome pora raj kora jaga asele aru ta te Ephesus he sob pora bisi dangor sheher thakise.  jagate ki digdar hoise, etu apnikhan najani kene thakibo dibo mon nai. Ta te amikhan dukh pa to amikhan laga takot bahar thakise aru etu nimite amikhan jinda thaki bole bhi asha nathaka hoi jaisele.
